Title: Hazaaron Khwaishein Aisi
Writer: Sudhir Mishra (original story & screenplay), Shivkumar Subramaniam (original story & screenplay), Ruchi Narain (original story & screenplay)
Actors: Kay Kay Menon, Shiney Ahuja, Chitrangda Singh, Ram Kapoor
Plot: Geeta Rao has two admirers - one is Siddharth Tyabji and the other is Vikram Malhotra circa 1969 West Bengal that is witnessing it's struggle against the ruling Congress party, joining ...
